sentences: Öeldes talle oma arvamust, ta ei olnud nõus.
Kõigepealt öeldes, ma ei tea midagi selle kohta.
context: The Estonian word 'öeldes' is the elative case of the verb 'öelda' (to say/speak). It functions as an adverbial participle meaning 'when saying', 'by speaking', or 'in stating'. This form is commonly used to introduce a quote, opinion, or thought process. In the examples provided, it appears at the beginning of sentences to frame what follows as something being said or spoken about.
